assistant: Hi there! Let's start discovering the biodiversity around you. Could you take a picture of your surroundings? This will help us find some exciting species you might encounter!
No worries if you can't take a picture right now. Feel free to describe your surroundings or ask any questions you have about local wildlife or biodiversity. I'm here to help!
Bonjour ! Comment puis-je vous aider aujourd'hui ?
Oeps, excuseer me! Ik bedoelde natuurlijk "Hallo!" Hoe kan ik je vandaag helpen?
